title: U.S. automobile registrations 1999 to 2017
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of passenger cars, with a total of 4 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly negative which exists from 2017 to 1999.
Conversely, the next significant trend is slightly positive which exists from 2017 to 2017.
gold: This statistic represents the number of registered automobiles in the United States from 1999 through 2017 . In 2017 , there were about 111 million automobiles registered in the United States . In 2017 , a total of around 272 million motor vehicles were registered in the U.S .
